Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.filter

Class ActionFilter

java.lang.Object
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.filter.ActionFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionFilterIds, ActionFilterOrphaned, ActionFilterRegex, ActionFilterSourceFile, ActionFilterSourceLocation, ActionFilterStatus, ActionFilterTag, ActionFilterTagRegex, ActionFilterText, ActionFilterType, BaseAgoActionFilter, BaseCollectionActionFilter, BaseRangeActionFilter
public abstract class ActionFilter extends Object
The JSON representation of filters for actions used by the front end

  • Method Details

    • extractFromText

      public static Optional<ActionFilter> extractFromText(String text, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper)
      Find action filters and action identifiers encoded as exported URL-like objects in arbitrary text
      Parameters:
      text - the text to search
      mapper - an object mapper for decoding JSON data
      Returns:
      a filter that contains the union of any filters or action identifiers discovered, if any were

    • joinAllAnd

      public static <F, T, S, I, O> Stream<ca.on.oicr.gsi.Pair<String,F>> joinAllAnd(String baseName, F baseFilters, Stream<ca.on.oicr.gsi.Pair<String,F>> accessoryFilters, ActionFilterBuilder<F,T,S,I,O> builder)
      Take the base filter and intersect it with the union of all accessory filters
      Type Parameters:
      F - the resulting filter type
      T - action state type
      S - string type
      I - time instant type
      O - time offset type
      Parameters:
      baseName - the name for the joined result
      baseFilters - the filters to always include in every result
      accessoryFilters - the set of filters to join against
      builder - the filter builder
      Returns:
      a stream of labelled constructed filters

    • joinAllExcept

      public static <F, T, S, I, O> Stream<ca.on.oicr.gsi.Pair<String,F>> joinAllExcept(String baseName, F baseFilters, Stream<ca.on.oicr.gsi.Pair<String,F>> accessoryFilters, ActionFilterBuilder<F,T,S,I,O> builder)
      Take the base filter and remove all the accessory filters
      Type Parameters:
      F - the resulting filter type
      T - action state type
      S - string type
      I - time instant type
      O - time offset type
      Parameters:
      baseName - the name for the joined result
      baseFilters - the filters to always include in every result
      accessoryFilters - the set of filters to remove
      builder - the filter builder
      Returns:
      a stream of labelled constructed filters

    • joinEachAnd

      public static <F, T, S, I, O> Stream<ca.on.oicr.gsi.Pair<String,F>> joinEachAnd(String baseName, F baseFilters, Stream<ca.on.oicr.gsi.Pair<String,F>> accessoryFilters, ActionFilterBuilder<F,T,S,I,O> builder)
      Take each accessory filter and produce the intersection of the base filter and the accessory filter
      Type Parameters:
      F - the resulting filter type
      T - action state type
      S - string type
      I - time instant type
      O - time offset type
      Parameters:
      baseName - the name for the joined result
      baseFilters - the filters to always include in every result
      accessoryFilters - the set of filters to join against
      builder - the filter builder
      Returns:
      a stream of labelled constructed filters

    • parse

      public static <T, S, I, O> Parser parse(Parser parser, Parser.Rule<T> actionState, Parser.RuleWithLiteral<S,String> string, Parser.RuleWithLiteral<S,String> strings, Parser.RuleWithLiteral<I,Instant> instant, Parser.RuleWithLiteral<O,Long> offset, Consumer<ActionFilter.ActionFilterNode<T,S,I,O>> output)
      Parse an action filter using the parse rules provided
      Type Parameters:
      T - action state type
      S - string type
      I - time instant type
      O - time offset type
      Parameters:
      parser - the parser state
      actionState - the rule to parse action states
      string - the rule to parse strings
      strings - the rule to parse sets of strings
      instant - the rule to parse time instants
      offset - the rule to parse time offsets
      output - the callback to hold the output
      Returns:
      the output parser state

    • parseQuery

      public static Optional<ActionFilter> parseQuery(String input, Function<String,Optional<ActionFilter>> existing, ErrorConsumer errorHandler)
      Parse an action filter query
      Parameters:
      input - the query to parse
      existing - any pre-defined action filters for named variable substitution
      errorHandler - a collector for errors
      Returns:
      the resulting action filter, if successful

    • convert

      public abstract <F> F convert(ActionFilterBuilder<F,ActionState,String,Instant,Long> builder)
      Convert a filter to a real implementation using the standard type parameters
      Type Parameters:
      F - the filter type
      Parameters:
      builder - the filter builder
      Returns:
      the constructed filter

    • isNegate

      public boolean isNegate()
      Checks whether the filter's output is inverted
      Returns:
      if true, invert the filter's output

    • maybeNegate

      protected <F, T, S, I, O> F maybeNegate(F filter, ActionFilterBuilder<F,T,S,I,O> filterBuilder)
      A utility function to negate a filter if set
      Type Parameters:
      F - the resulting filter type
      T - action state type
      S - string type
      I - time instant type
      O - time offset type
      Parameters:
      filter - the filter to be negated
      filterBuilder - the filter builder
      Returns:
      the possibly negated filter
